title: Readout of the Vice President's Call with Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Vice President


For Immediate Release
June 12, 2015

 



Readout of the Vice President's Call with Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko





	Vice President Joe Biden spoke today with Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko about the situation in the eastern part of the country and Ukraine’s reform agenda. The two leaders agreed on the importance of maintaining sanctions on Russia  until it fully implements the Minsk agreements, and that additional significant sanctions would be necessary if Russia further escalates the conflict. The Vice President and President Poroshenko agreed that the path to economic growth requires moving forward with the implementation of comprehensive economic and rule of law reforms.
